name: I Wanna Be Smoothie
description:
The story of a tomato can be sad as a fruit. Most of the time ignored and used as a vegetable... BUT NOT TODAY! Take control of our little friend and fulfill its dream to become one with all the other fruits in I Wanna Be Smoothie!

All made by Team Blended Hamster, a team of two, for ScoreSpace Jam #14 🕹️!

*used a font by Wepfont on fontspace.com and a music by Kevin Macleod on incompetech.com
